aWLI_StateProvision.content: {\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252\deff0\deflang1036{\fonttbl{\f0\fnil\fcharset0 MS Sans Serif;}{\f1\fnil\fcharset2 Symbol;}} {\colortbl ;\red0\green0\blue0;} \viewkind4\uc1\pard\cf1\f0\fs20 In consideration of the premium charged, it is understood and agreed that:\par \pard{\pntext\f1\'B7\tab}{\*\pn\pnlvlblt\pnf1\pnindent0{\pntxtb\'B7}}each coverage; coverage A, coverage B, coverage C applies only if that coverage is listed in the declarations\par {\pntext\f1\'B7\tab}if a cause of loss covered by this endorsement occurs to covered building property, the company will pay:\par \pard{\pntext\f1\'B7\tab}{\*\pn\pnlvlblt\pnf1\pnindent0{\pntxtb\'B7}}\li720 under coverage A: for the loss in value of the undamaged portion of the building as a consequence of enforcement of any ordinance or law that:\par \pard{\pntext\f1\'B7\tab}{\*\pn\pnlvlblt\pnf1\pnindent0{\pntxtb\'B7}}\li1440 requires the demolition of parts of the same property not damaged by a cause of loss covered by this endorsement\par {\pntext\f1\'B7\tab}regulates the construction or repair of buildings\par {\pntext\f1\'B7\tab}is in force at the time of loss\par \pard{\pntext\f1\'B7\tab}{\*\pn\pnlvlblt\pnf1\pnindent0{\pntxtb\'B7}}\li720 under coverage B: the cost to demolish and clear the site of undamaged parts of the property\par {\pntext\f1\'B7\tab}under coverage C: for the increase cost to:\par \pard{\pntext\f1\'B7\tab}{\*\pn\pnlvlblt\pnf1\pnindent0{\pntxtb\'B7}}\li1440 repair or reconstruct damaged portions of covered building property\par {\pntext\f1\'B7\tab}reconstruct or remodel undamaged portions of covered building property\par {\pntext\f1\'B7\tab}the cost of excavations, gradings, backfilling and filling\par {\pntext\f1\'B7\tab}foundations of the building\par {\pntext\f1\'B7\tab}pilings\par {\pntext\f1\'B7\tab}underground pipes\par }
aWLI_StateProvision.Title: Apartment Building-Inflation Guard Form
aWLI_StateProvision.Name: Apartment Building-Ordinance or Law Form
